title: How to Know You’re Hearing Spiritual Guidance
description:
“How do I know if it’s my intuition … or my fear?” I’ve been getting some version of this question for decades! And on this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I’m going to set the record straight once and for all. Press play to learn how to know when your inner guide is trying to communicate with you … and when it’s your fear holding you back.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode.

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3lHpXVt 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3yZxNSc

If you want to read more about connecting with your spirit guides, I have two book recommendations for you. Super Attractor and The Universe Has Your Back are both packed with methods for getting aligned with your own inner guidance system and tapping into the voice of your spirit guides. 

In this episode, I also refer to my book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. As I told a caller on today’s show, Happy Days can help you feel more settled in your own internal system, which will help you feel more confident and settled in every area of your life—including relationships! https://bit.ly/38oFZAA

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Your new favorite shoes are waiting. Discover the versatile styles you can wear absolutely anywhere and get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY. 

 

Get unlimited access to EVERY MasterClass, and as a Dear Gabby listener, you get 15% off an annual membership! Go to masterclass.com/gabby

 

Now is a great time to try Thrive Causemetics for yourself! Right now, you can get 15% off your first order when you visit thrivecausemetics.com/gabby

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Produced by Dear Media.
